True.name: c1
True.message: You walk up the stairs to the attic. At the top of the stairs is a door. it is locked. You remembered you found a key in the library, could it be for this door? You take the keyout of your pocket and try to open the door. It works! The door opens to reveal another hall. You step into the hall. This hall has doors to the spare bedroom, a storage room, and a children's room.
choices: Return downstairs to the hall again
